info.description: Component to inject CSS from Proctor test payloads
info.documentation:
In Proctor, ensure your test name begins with "cssJsInjection".
Set each bucket's payload type to String Array. Index 0 is the CSS payload. Index 1 is the JS payload.
Example:
### Inactive bucket ``` ["", ""] ```
### Control bucket ``` ["", ""] ```
### Active bucket ``` [".foo{color:red}", "$('.title').text('Injected')"] ```
